name: 1_d4sh
description:
A platformer for submission for weekly jam 149 theme: Last One Left.

COLLECT ALL COINS LEVELS - 20 FIND MY HIDDEN SECRET AT THE END OF THE GAME.

You got only one teleport ability/ level, which player need to use wisely to complete the level.

Controls: - You will Learn as game progresses.

This project was made for learning difficulty curve i.e Flow graph and pixel art.

Pixel Art by:- https://www.instagram.com/sreehari_p.s/
